item.description:
With the great turnout and good time we had last week, lets do it again!

In deference to the various football games that are on at 1PM this will be a morning session of running around chasing a frisbee so that we can all sit around and get stiff muscles in the afternoon.

Seriously, come out and play some ultimate frisbee. Don't know how to play? We only use the very basic rules and have a good time getting some exercise out of doors. We usually play for around 2 hours, so plenty of time to get to your favorite football viewing spot.

If someone can bring a frisbee, that'd be great. If fewer than 6 sign up, I will cancel.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be by the statue at the north end of the park.
item.name: Ultimate Frisbee @ Armory Park (work off those calories!)
